title: The Long Road to Freedom
description: Two Tulsa, Oklahoma brothers fight for more than 20 years to prove their innocence after they were each wrongfully convicted for separate murders. Craig Melvin reports. Originally aired on NBC on June 19, 2020.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
